alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Charles (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 27 at 3:43PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southern Maryland, including the following counties, Calvert and Charles. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST Sunday through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Saturated soils combined with moderate to locally heavy rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2 inches could result in areas of flooding. 6-hour rainfall totals could exceed 1 inch in many spots early Sunday morning. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
